name: AlbuminInBloodPlasmaOrSerum
title: Albumin in Blood, Plasma, or Serum
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains laboratory observable term codes for Albumin results in blood.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to discover or request blood Albumin levels in clinical records.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes laboratory LOINC encoded observable terms representing Albumin terms in blood.),(Exclusion Criteria: Laboratory LOINC encoded terms that do not represent Albumin terms in blood.)
